RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LFTMS_RULE.CUSTOMER = LFTMS_BRACKET.CUSTOMER AND LFTMS_RULE.CURRENCY = LFTMS_BRACKET.CURRENCY AND LFTMS_RULE.CURRENCY2 = LFTMS_BRACKET.CURRENCY2 AND LFTMS_RULE.RULE = LFTMS_BRACKET.RULE AND LFTMS_RULE.BRANCH = LFTMS_BRACKET.BRANCH AND LFTMS_RULE.ACCOUNT_NO = LFTMS_BRACKET.ACCOUNT_NO AND LFTMS_RULE.ACCT_CATEGORY = LFTMS_BRACKET.ACCT_CATEGORY AND LFTMS_RULE.CUST_GROUP = LFTMS_BRACKET.CUST_GROUP

LFTMS_BRACKET.RULE = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.RULE AND LFTMS_BRACKET.CURRENCY = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.CURRENCY AND LFTMS_BRACKET.CUSTOMER = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.CUSTOMER AND LFTMS_BRACKET.CURRENCY2 = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.CURRENCY2 AND LFTMS_BRACKET.BASIS_AMOUNT_TO = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.BASIS_AMOUNT_TO AND LFTMS_BRACKET.BRANCH = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.BRANCH AND LFTMS_BRACKET.ACCOUNT_NO = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.ACCOUNT_NO AND LFTMS_BRACKET.ACCT_CATEGORY = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.ACCT_CATEGORY AND LFTMS_BRACKET.CUST_GROUP = LFTMS_BRACKET_TENOR.CUST_GROUP

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CCY_CODE, CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' UNION SELECT '*.*','ALL CURRENCIES' FROM DUAL
SELECT BRANCH_CODE FROM OLTMS_BRANCH WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL
SELECT CUST_GROUP FROM OLTM_CUST_GROUP WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND CUST_GROUP_TYPE = ? UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME1 NAME FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ALL CUSTOMERS' FROM DUAL
SELECT ACC_CATEGORY_CODE FROM OLTM_ACC_CATEGORY WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL
SELECT AC_GL_NO FROM OLTB_ACCOUNT WHERE AC_GL_REC_STATUS = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND AUTH_STAT='A' AND BRANCH_CODE =GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH UNION SELECT 'ALL' FROM DUAL ORDER BY AC_GL_NO
SELECT DISTINCT CCY_RATE_TYPE FROM CYTM_RATE_TYPE WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
SELECT CCY_CODE, CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
SELECT RULE_ID,DESCRIPTION,RULE_TYPE FROM LFTB_ICCF_RLAVL WHERE RULE_TYPE in ('I','H') AND RECORD_STAT ='O' AND ONCE_AUTH ='Y' ORDER BY RULE_ID
